definitions.text: a natural and periodic state of rest during which consciousness of the world is suspended
examples: he didn't get enough sleep last night
calm as a child in dreamless slumber

definitions.text: a torpid state resembling deep sleep
a period of time spent sleeping
examples: he felt better after a little sleep
there wasn't time for a nap

definitions.text: euphemisms for death (based on an analogy between lying in a bed and in a tomb)
examples: she was laid to rest beside her husband
they had to put their family pet to sleep

definitions.text: be able to accommodate for sleeping
